name: CPMessageListItem
desc: A list template row that represents a conversation or contact.

items.name: init(conversationIdentifier: String, text: String, leadingConfiguration: CPMessageListItemLeadingConfiguration, trailingConfiguration: CPMessageListItemTrailingConfiguration?, detailText: String?, trailingText: String?)
items.desc: Creates a list item that represents an existing conversation.

items.name: init(fullName: String, phoneOrEmailAddress: String, leadingConfiguration: CPMessageListItemLeadingConfiguration, trailingConfiguration: CPMessageListItemTrailingConfiguration?, detailText: String?, trailingText: String?)
items.desc: Creates a list item that represents a contact.

items.name: var phoneOrEmailAddress: String?
items.desc: The contact’s phone number or email address.

items.name: var leadingConfiguration: CPMessageListItemLeadingConfiguration
items.desc: The configuration of the list item’s leading region.

items.name: class CPMessageListItemLeadingConfiguration
items.desc: An object that describes the appearance of a message list item’s leading region.

items.name: var trailingConfiguration: CPMessageListItemTrailingConfiguration?
items.desc: The configuration of the list item’s trailing region.

items.name: class CPMessageListItemTrailingConfiguration
items.desc: An object that describes the appearance of a message list item’s trailing region.

items.name: var userInfo: Any?
items.desc: An opaque value for the list item.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the item is enabled.
